title: LangChain and Google Gemini API for AI Apps: A Quickstart Guide
author: Oladimeji Sowole
description: With these advanced technologies you can generate text, analyze images and implement multimodal AI interactions.
cntitle: LangChain 和 Google Gemini API for AI 应用程序：快速入门指南
cndescription: 借助这些先进技术，您可以生成文本、分析图像并实现多模态 AI 交互。
